sections.title: Prometheus Consulting & Implementing in Production
sections.description: Our in-house Prometheus experts analyze your application framework and suggest the best way to implement and configure Prometheus. Experts build your monitoring & observability stack with best practices.
offerings: Our team of Prometheus consultants & architects will do an in-depth analysis of your systems and monitoring requirements to provide a cohesive monitoring solution.
We will help you with proper instrumentation for the codebase for exposing the data in Prometheus.
Gathering and labeling of the metrics for easier consumption of the data collected and making it production ready.

sections.title: Incident Management
sections.description: With Prometheus metrics data collection, incidents can be tracked and responded to faster than before. Explore how our Prometheus experts help you with incident management.
offerings: The team of consultants & architects will assist you in setting up Prometheus Alertmanager for tracking incidents across the infrastructure.
This will result in creation of alerts and real-time notification based on the metrics gathered.
Gathered metrics can be further utilized for analyzing and giving correct incident response, thus reducing your time and efforts.
Exporters can be used for collecting metrics for further post mortem analysis.

sections.title: Modeling and Data Query
sections.description: With deep expertise in Prometheus-based monitoring solutions, our Prometheus experts will help you with your data modeling and querying.
offerings: Assistance in modeling, labeling, and aggregating the collected data for easier consumption.
Utilization of PromQL to gather insights from your systems and collect meaningful data and metrics.

sections.title: Integration with Third Party Tools
sections.description: Learn how our Prometheus experts help you integrate Prometheus with other tools to enhance its observability capabilities.
offerings: Integration of Grafana with Prometheus to create custom, visually attractive, and useful dashboards based on the collected metrics.
Native integration of Loki for aggregating logs from your systems.
Use of Alertmanager for sending notifications using tools like PagerDuty.
Assistance in configuring tools like KEDA with Prometheus for auto-scaling your application in real-time based on custom metrics.

sections.title: Prometheus Commercial Support & Training
sections.description: As an officially recognized Prometheus commercial support partner, our experts will help you with your end-to-end monitoring journey, from assessment and advisory to building your observability stack.
offerings: Assistance in getting your team up to speed on industry best practices and knowledge transfer to drive the integration further.
Help in mastering Prometheus concepts and addressing any issues faced while deploying or configuring the stack.
Support in building a future-ready team that understands the intricacies of Prometheus.
